definition: ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: I wore this Trilby a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我一直戴着這頂爵士帽。

sentences.english: Swing Dynasty Jazz and chanson Franaise band based in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在上海組建的法國爵士和香頌。

sentences.english: Sir Muir said he understood why Dr Campbell had withdrawn.
sentences.chinese: 繆爾爵士稱，他明白坎貝爾博士爲何退出了專家組。

sentences.english: One of my all-time favorite jazz pianists is Thelonious Monk.
sentences.chinese: 瑟隆尼亞斯孟克是我其中一個最愛的爵士樂鋼琴家。

sentences.english: It is certainly much more than mere background music.
sentences.chinese: 爵士樂絕不僅僅只是背景音樂。

sentences.english: It was the same when he was 7)knighted.
sentences.chinese: 他受封爲爵士時也是如此。

sentences.english: Ragtime also influenced the creation of jazz.
sentences.chinese: 拉格泰姆音樂也影響了爵士樂的形成。

sentences.english: College stations play all kinds of music, from jazz to hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 大學電臺播放各種類型的音樂，從爵士到重搖滾。

sentences.english: Another Honda factory in Guangzhou produces Jazz sedans for export.
sentences.chinese: 另一個在廣州的本田廠用來生產出口的爵士轎車。

sentences.english: Three years earlier, she was the first-ever vocalist admitted to the Thelonious Monk Institute of Jazz Performance.
sentences.chinese: 三年前，她是第一次住進了歌手蒙克爵士樂學院性能。

sentences.english: Of course syncopation and blues are only part of the jazz picture.
sentences.chinese: 當然，切分音和藍調只是爵士的一部分。

sentences.english: You been looking at my turnips since you came in, ser.
sentences.chinese: 從你進來起就在盯着我的蕪菁看了，爵士。

sentences.english: "Ser Robert, " Cersei whispered, as they entered the gates.
sentences.chinese: “勞勃爵士，”當他們進門的時候，瑟曦低聲說。

sentences.english: I want to be good at playing the drums.
Sir Henry's other shoe had not reappeared.
sentences.chinese: 亨利爵士的另一隻鞋沒有再冒出來過。

sentences.english: For all his star-gazing, Sir Arthur's feet were firmly on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他耽於幻想，亞瑟爵士的足跡卻是堅實的。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
